front.div:
Provides usage and reference information for the GeoRaster
feature of Oracle Spatial, which lets you store, index, query,
analyze, and deliver raster data (raster image and gridded
data and its associated metadata).
front.note: Oracle Spatial GeoRaster Developer's Guide, 11g Release 1 (11.1)

byline.docAuthor:
Contributors: Qingyun (Jeffrey) Xie, Weisheng (Terry) Xu, Sophia Yuditskaya, Zhihai Zhang, Hongwei
Zhu
